pages.text: The extractor has filtering-capabilities. It has a GUI, so read this chapter to learn more about it!

To enable filtering-functions, Right-click on the extractor. A GUI with 9 fields will open.$(br)If you leave it empty, everything will be extracted.$(br)If you put in items, only those items will be extracted (whitelist).
The amount of one itemstack is not doing anything at the moment. In a future-update it will have functionality.
The OPI is placed on the side of a belt. The belt should NOT point towards the OPI.$(br)This way, the OPI can decide to take or leave the item.
